Duis aliquam convallis nunc.","date":"4/3/2023"}]`) interface Message { id: string, first_name: string, last_name: string, message: string; date: string } @Component({ selector: 'app-chat', templateUrl: './chat.component.html', styleUrls: ['./chat.component.css'], host: { class: "w-full h-full flex flex-col text-white" } }) export class ChatComponent { messages: Message[] = data; }
